    • Constructor Detail

      • Segment

        public Segment(Point1 _poLeft,
               Point1 _poRight)
        Construct a segment. If the segment is not parallel to the x axis then change the y coordinate of the right point according to the y coordinate of the left point.
        Parameters:
        _poLeft - - The left point of the segment
        _poRight - - The right point of the segment

      • Segment

        public Segment(int lx,
               int ly,
               int rx,
               int ry)
        Construct a segment. If the segment is not parallel to the x axis then change the y coordinate of the right point according to the y coordinate of the left point.
        Parameters:
        lx - - The x coordinate of the left point
        ly - - The y coordinate of the left point
        rx - - The x coordinate of the right point
        ry - - The y coordinate of the right point

      • Segment

        public Segment(Segment s)
        Copy constructor for Segments. Construct a segment with the same left and right points of other segment.
        Parameters:
        s - - The segment object from which to construct the new segment
